titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation Tho. Cantuar. J. Sommers C. Sunderland, Romney. Whereas this present Parliament stands prorogued to the three and twentieth day of November next; ...
Proclamations. 1697-10-21
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.

titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation Tho. Cantuar. J. Sommers C. Sunderland, Romney. Whereas this present Parliament stands prorogued to the three and twentieth day of November next; ...
Proclamations. 1697-10-21
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd, printers to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
At end of text: "Given at the court at Whitehall the one and twentieth day of October, 1697. In the ninth year of His Majesties reign. God save the King.".
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.

person.persName: Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd
